title: FPS Softcapped at 27?
body: Getting some strange bug that's new to the patch where my FPS is capped at around 27 where I usually had it capped at 60 and would easily outperform that.  Any known bugs?

replies.body:
Hey Socrates, 

That's a pretty strange issue. You may be able to resolve this by deleting your game.cfg file. After that, restart League and the file will repopulate. This may resolve your cap.

Reply to this if you have any questions!
